dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: namedPlace
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This tables stores information about the various 'named places' that a plot may have been sample within.
entity.entityDescription: This table was added to the plots database during the Septemeber meeting at NCEAS. By including this table one can query a 'set' of plots within a given 'named place'. For example one could query all plots sampled within the Yosemite National Forest. We feel that the inclusion of this table will nullify the need for a sitename attribute.

attribute.attDefinition: Internal database unique value assigned to every named place entered in the database.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the plot table.
attribute.attDefinition: This key links a named place to a plot.

attribute.attNotes: Name of a place like: Yosemitie National Park.
attribute.attDefinition: The name of the place at which a plot was sampled.
This is the description of a named place.
This is a reference to a gazeteer containing the named place.
